alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Keith, western Garden and northwestern Deuel Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 to near Sunol. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oshkosh, Lewellen, Lisco, Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Dogtown Flats, Intersection of Highway 27 and 9 Mile Road, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Richardson Lake, Mumper, Mount Vernon, Bluewater Battlefield State Historical Park, Windlass Hill and Sugar Loaf Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 116. Interstate 80 in Nebraska near mile marker 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
